Kleinberg Helper Functions¶

This module provides functions to compute the minimum connection radius and connection probability prefactor for the 2D-versions of the modified random geometric Kleinberg small-world network model.

sixdegrees.kleinberg_helper_functions.f(r)[source]¶
sixdegrees.kleinberg_helper_functions.f_PBC(r)[source]¶
